title: Properties of Nuclear Radiation
creator_credit: D Carswell, University of New South Wales and Sydney Scientific Film Society
brief_description: Deals with the origin and properties of three types of radiation: alpha, beta and gamma. Examines each type pf radiation, indicates their more important properties and outlines their particular fields of activity.
